DevComment: This is a generic selection entry used, when nothing is selected (e.g. could be used for an entry in tattoo style, where no tattoos are present).
This is a generic selection entry, that dynamically counts up (e.g. could be used, to list different hair styles).
This is a generic selection entry, that dynamically counts up (e.g. could be used, to list different head types).
This category uses a 7-point scale describing skin type, ranging from dry (1) to shiny (7).
This category uses a 5-point scale describing body hair amount, ranging from light (1) to extreme (5).
This category lists different scar types, based on intensity, age or cause.
This category uses a 3-point scale describing hair texture, ranging from dull (1) to glossy (3).
This category lists different eyebrow types based on shape and thickness.
This category uses a 4-point scale describing eyelash length, ranging from short (1) to very long (4).
This category lists different tattoo styles based on different patterns.
This category lists different body paint styles based on pattern and location.
This category lists different body paint types based on texture and intensity.
This category uses a 3-point scale describing makeup intensity, ranging from light (1) to strong (3).

SourceString: Détails des cheveux et de la barbe
